body: This girl is a fucking idiot. Her 'backstory' about why she's doing this can't even suspend my disbelief. If anything, she totally gets off on being massively abused and is just lying to herself so she doesn't feel like a crazy whore.
Legit hoping for a scene where she's getting ready to jump off the school's roof THEN the dude comes in and saves her.
Can anybody upload or find me Comic Mate Legend vol. 11, like the whole magazine? I need my monthly Oyster update.
I'm surprise that at this point no one ne has even attempted to commit suicide or tried to kill someone...
